profile:
Encore Electric Inc.

Who We Are
Located in Barrie ON. Encore Electric Inc. is a family owned operation that brings two main elements to your electrical work. Quality and Customer Service. We take pride in the work we complete and creating satisfied customers in the process. We intend to stand out from the industry average! 

We do all types of electrical installation including 200A Service Upgrades, Type 2 EV Charger and Tesla EV Charger, Knob and Tube Removal, Aluminum Wiring Replacement, Fuse Panel Upgrades, Pot Light Installation, Smart Home Automation, and all aspects of the Electrical Trade!

Contact Chris directly to set up an appointment for a Free Estimate!


You can be confident in hiring Encore Electric Inc. Our philosophy is that if we provide a great service, and the customer is satisfied, they will want to hire us again! 

READ OUR REVIEWS!!
We understand testimonials are a big part in showing how a company operates. We are proud of all our reviews we receive and our clients have been fantastic in leaving such positive reviews. There's no better reference of a company than past customers. We take pride in keeping our customers satisfied, and it shows in our reviews.

profile:
Welcome to Jory Electric Ltd.

We have been servicing York/Simcoe, GTA and surrounding areas since 2021. We are a close knit group who has worked together for many years prior to establishing the company.

We have much experience with custom homes, panel/service upgrades, retro fit pot lights and EV Chargers. We offer a full warranty on all devices supplied and installed by us. Our crews show up on time and prepared for even the smallest of jobs to ensure a timely service for our clients.

We are fully licenced, insured and bonded!

To find out more, please visit our website and social media pages or reach out for a free estimate!

profile:
Our mission at Moon Tech Electric is to provide you with exceptional electrical service for your property. We are centered in Newmarket servicing  the GTA and surrounding area. We specialize in the residential and commercial sectors with 24/7 electrical emergency response. 
Are you looking for a master electrician in the GTA for your electrical work?
Moon Tech Electric is here with a qualified master electrician and journeyman to provide you with safe, reliable and satisfying electrical work.
We have a wide variety of services for our client such as;

Lighting and energy management
Emergency lighting systems 
fire suppression systems
Transformers
Lighting control systems
Interior and exterior lighting installations
Light fixture replacements
Dimmer switches, ceiling and exhaust fans
Home inspections and ESA certifications
Electrical remodeling, Renovations and additions
Pot lights and low voltage wiring
Hot tube and pool pump wiring
Panel upgrades
Meter base changes
Service upgrades and sub panel installations

Don't forget!
Electrical work is risky and the best way to keep your family and home safe is to hire a licensed electrical contractor for the job. In Ontario, ask your contractor for a certificate of acceptance from the Electrical Safety Authority.


ECRA/ESA 7015284
Call us to get a free estimate
